101012.扉には カギが かかっている。\n<br>\n研究室に入るには 西の塔３階の\n:
The door is locked.
It seems that to enter the laboratory, one must go through the hidden door in the Hero Princess' room on the third floor of the Western Tower.

79465.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ここはよお。そ:
Hey there. Long ago, serious criminals were locked up here, I tell ya. I know since I was one of them.
I tried to break out by cutting a hole in the ceiling, but screwed up and ended up like this.
Check out the cell: you can climb the ladder and leave through the hole I made to get out the castle.

79466.<pc>は はしごを昇った。\n<br>\nはしごの先に こちら側から\nカギの:
climbed the ladder. At the top of the ladder is a locked door.
used the key and opened the door.
